comment.author: Katelynn
comment.text: I don't think I've ever seen so many AMERICAN FLAGS on a stage for any presidential speech or debate. Im glad I'm alive today to see the changes that are coming to America.

replies.author: Logan
replies.text: So what? Trump is still a lunatic no matter how many flags he has.

replies.author: Jordyn
replies.text: Logan doesn't care. He has time to count flags he has no job no life no contribution. Thanks Logan. Don't vote we don't need you move to Canada

replies.author: Jordyn
replies.text: Funny. Yet another NON American worrying about MY COUNTRY bump off. Go get YOUR COUNTRY RIGHT stay out of ours why you Aussies are so into it. Get into your own kiwis

replies.author: Conor
replies.text: Everyone should change their Profile Picture to Trump!!! Wouldn't that be a Big Statement to the World. Unite the Trump Supporters! ..... Vote Nov. 8th for Trump.
